description: Create, update, or destroy Ansible Tower projects. See U(https://www.ansible.com/tower) for an overview.

scm_credential.description: Name of the credential to use with this scm resource.

scm_branch.description: The branch to use for the scm resource.

description.description: Description to use for the project.

scm_delete_on_update.description: Remove the repository completely before updating.

tower_config_file.description: Path to the Tower config file. See notes.

local_path.description: The server playbook directory for manual projects.

scm_update_on_launch.description: Before an update to the local repository before launching a job with this project.

organization.description: Primary key of organization for project.

tower_verify_ssl.description: Dis/allow insecure connections to Tower. If C(no), SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only be used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates.

name.description: Name to use for the project.
